name: Pop Rap
description: Fuses Hip Hop's rapping and production traits with Pop elements such as melodious vocals and light, catchy tunes.

children.name: Bop
children.description: Grew out of the Chicago Drill scene in the early 2010s, characterized by autotuned vocals and upbeat synth melodies.

children.name: Frat Rap
children.description: Light-hearted and laid-back with lyrical focuses on subjects such as partying and college life.
